titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Stillman Visscher Jenks photograph collection. 1918?.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.unittitle: Stillman Visscher Jenks photograph collection circa 1918
did.abstract: Member of 339th U.S. Infantry who was killed during the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes a portrait of Jenks.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., Stillman Visscher Jenks photograph collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Soldier in the 339th U.S. Infantry who was killed during the U.S. intervention in the Russian Civil War.
